LanguageData.Turret_MortarCave.label: mortar (low trajectory)
LanguageData.Turret_MortarCave.description: A mortar that launches explosive shells. Must be manned. Explodes when damaged. Uses direct low trajectory: requires a direct line of sight and reduces range but increases accuracy.
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarCave.label: mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_MortarCave.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
